nodes.text: Would you like to have an apple, O Apple of my Eye?
Apple of your eye? Really? Do people actually say things like that? I mean, normal people... After all, Shawn, you are not a normal person by anyone's standards.
And I mean that in the nicest way. Who wants to be normal?
This beaded necklace would look lovely on you. Would you like to have it?
<snort>. It's pretty. It's not the sort of thing I'd normally wear, but it's sweet of you to offer it to me. Thanks.
Isn't it nice, Esme?
It is lovely, yes. Shawn must truly like you.
It is nice, yes. Shawn must be very sweet on you.
This is probably the best wine ever made. I can think of no one I'd rather share it with than you. Would you like it?
Wow, that is something special. Thanks.
I think we should share it with Esme, don't you, Shawn?
No, thank you, Katie. I think this is special thing for you and Shawn.
Thank you, I am happy to share such good drink and friendships!
To good drink, good friends, and smooth sailing through the rough seas of life!
Now that was a drink was worth sharing... Thanks, Shawn.
I have a bottle of fine wine. Would you like to share it with me?
Sure, as long as we keep it concealed when Terk shows up, let's pass it around and share with everyone.
Thanks for sharing!
I came across a bottle of Golden Wine. It's a rare treasure... much like you are. Will you share it with me?
Heh... You romantic, you. Let's share it with Esme, too.
No, thank you, Katie. I think this is special thing for you and Shawn.
Thank you, I am happy to share such good drink and friendships!
Here's to friends, fine wine, and fun!
Well, that's the last drop, and one I'll savor. Thanks, Shawn, you know how to make things fun.
Hmmm... you know your wine, don't you? Why don't we save this for a special occasion? This isn't the best time and place for drinking.
Every moment is special when I'm with you.
To show you how deeply I care about you, I'd like you to have this "One and Only" Ring. I would like you to be my 'One and Only'.
You're kidding, right? That's the sort of thing you give a lover. We're classmates, not best buds.
Shawn, I like you, but you are really dumb at times. That's the sort of gift you give to the one you love.
You want me to be your one and only true love?
You know, I really never thought about romance. I figured that most guys wouldn't want a pirate's daughter for anything other than a good time.
I need to think about this for a while, Shawn. You're a good friend. I like being with you. Do I love you? That's a question I can't answer, not even to myself.
Shawn, if anyone can win my wild heart, it will be you. Let's spend more time together before you try to put a ring around my finger, okay?
Shawn, I think of this as a courtship. The more we are together, the more I like you. I'm not ready to take your ring, but I'll let you know when I change my mind.
You seriously want me to be your true love?
Can't you tell? I want to share my life and my adventures with you - even the scary ones.
That's the nicest thing anyone's ever said to me! Oh, Shawn! <hug>
Shawn - you skunk! You said that I vas your true love! You gave me ring! You filthy, traitorous, two-faced, lying miel! I should tear your throat out!
Are you saying that Shawn gave you a "One and Only" Ring, too?
Da! Look! I am vearing it.
And here I thought you were really a nice guy... I should gut you like a fish!
But... I...
Don't say a word... not one word... or I'll pull that tongue from your mouth.
Well, that didn't go very well...
Look what Shawn just gave me!
Oh. It's very nice.
Shawn! You are vorthless goat of a man! You are pig! You are mgar!
What's wrong?
This mincinos bag of vind told me he loved me! I vill tear his throat out!
You told Esme you loved HER?
Well, I... maybe.
Don't say a word... not one word... or I'll gut your evil soul with a dagger!
Well, that didn't go very well...
I am very much happy for you both!
I found this book on Love Ballads. It expresses the way I feel about you. Would you like to have it?
Do I look like a Love Ballads kind of person? Sea chanteys, maybe. Sappy love songs? No thanks.
I found this magical ring... but it's not nearly as magical as you are. Would you like to keep it as a token of my feelings for you?
Why would you do such a thing? I mean, we barely know one another.
It's my way of saying that I'd like to get to know you better.
Guess what? You can't buy my friendship with bribes. You want to help me, fine. Work with me. Get to know me. Maybe then, I'll like you enough to accept this sort of thing.
That's a pretty valuable gift just to give to a friend.
I'd like to be more to you than just a friend.
You sure about that? I'm not the easiest person to get along with. I say what I think and I do what I believe in.
I can tell.
Okay. I like you. You're quirky and funny. If you want to help me, then thanks. I can probably use all the help I can get.
See what Shawn just gave me? It's a magical ring!
Shawn gave me one, too.
Do you give avay rings to every girl you meet, Shawn?
Um... no. Just to the sweetest girls I've ever met.
He gave me a ring, too. A "One and Only" Ring.
So Shawn, if I am your one and only, vhy are you giving Katie a ring? Sounds like you are big two-timer to me!
I... Uh... I'm just being friendly.
You better not be too friendly, Shawn. I vill tear out your throat!
Oh. It is nice, yes.
Maybe Shawn is your Sveetie now, no?
<shrug> Maybe...
Another ring? What's this, are you going to put rings on all my fingers and bells on my toes?
Seems like a good idea to me. After all, you've got a ring around my heart and you're the belle of my life.
<hug>
Are you giving me a ring, O'Conner? Is this a subtle hint or something?
<shrug> Subtle is my middle name, after all.
Ha! <hug>
I found this incredibly magical ring from a very dangerous adventure, and I'd like you to have it. It may help keep you safe when I'm not at your side.
Why would you do such a thing? I mean, we barely know one another.
It's my way of saying that I'd like to get to know you better.
Guess what? You can't buy my friendship with bribes. You want to help me, fine. Work with me. Get to know me. Maybe then, I'll like you enough to accept this sort of thing.
That's a pretty valuable gift just to give to a friend.

You sure about that? I'm not the easiest person to get along with. I say what I think and I do what I believe in.
I can tell.
Okay. I like you. You're quirky and funny. If you want to help me, then thanks. I can probably use all the help I can get.
See what Shawn just gave me? It's a magical ring!
Shawn gave me one, too.
Do you give away rings to every girl you meet, Shawn?
Um... no. Just to the sweetest girls I've ever met.
He gave me a ring, too. A 'One and Only' ring.
So Shawn, if I am your one and only, vhy are you giving Katie a ring? Sounds like you are big two-timer to me!
I... Uh... I'm just being friendly.
You better not be too friendly, Shawn. I vill tear out your throat!
Oh. It is nice, yes.

<shrug> Maybe...

<shrug> Subtle is my middle name, after all.

<hug>
Are you giving me a ring, O'Conner? Is this a subtle hint or something?
<shrug> Subtle is my middle name, after all.
Ha! <hug>
I picked out this beautiful rose just to give to you.
A rose... You are giving me a rose. Do I look like a rose person to you?
Actually, yes. Roses remind me of you... Roses may look tender and lovely, but they are strong and sharp enough to defend themselves.
Are you saying I'm prickly?
Uh... no... I didn't mean...
Okay, it's the thought that counts. Thanks.
I brought you another rose because you're so sweet.
Giving me flowers is a really silly thing to do.
Would you like to have the Captain's hat?
Would I like the moldy, smelly hat of something that should have been buried years ago?
You bet I would! That's a prize I'll wear proudly.
